Bibliographic References: PP, no. 5, pis. 2 A and 3 b; PPSupp, no. 6; LCS, p. 204, no. 31, pi. 80, 2; Suppl. Ill, p. 99, no. 54; Sikanie, figs. 283; LIMC III, p. 662, Dolan 17, pi. 528, 1.
Imagery Description: (a) Ambush of Dolon, (b) maenad seated between maenad and satyr
Additional Notes: For the subject of the obverse see F. Lissarrague, Rev Arch 1980, fasc. 1, p. 12 and Trendall, NAC 12, 1983, p. 92.
